name: Paint
body:
PAINT

An OpenGL application to paint lines, polygons and fill colors using flood fill and checkered fill.

Compilation Instructions

  • Change current working directory to paint
  • paint contains src folder and a Makefile.
  • run the Makefile using make.
  • Object files will be created in obj folder and the excutable paint will be in the bin folder.
  • run the executable ./bin/paint to begin.

Makefile Instructions

  • use make for building the executable.
  • use make distclean or make clean to clean the directory
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
